desc: Shoebizz offers a very wide selection of shoe models and type of shoes including, dress wear, casual, work, water proof, jandals, sandals, slides(scuffs), skate, running, trainers, rugby, touch, and soccer. Shoebizz is not like these other big branded stores, we are a family run business.

layout.text: CHECKOUT OUR NEW STOCK IN STORE OR ONLINE!
